ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Textures Expanded - Mod Edition
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Helixien, Erin, Cody Spring
ModMetaData.description:
Adding support for other mods to use Vanilla Texture Expanded textures as well as giving them Main GUI Icons.
New Textures:
Alpha Animals: Sky Steel, Blue Milk Android Tiers: Nutrient Solution Gemstones: All Gemstones RimBees: Mead Fermenting Barrel RimCuisine 2: Bottling and Booze: All fermenting barrels
New Main Button UI Icons for the following:
Medical Tab Numbers Misc. Robots Hospitality (1.1 only) WeaponStats Colony Manager Auto Seller Empire Pharmacist InventoryTab Colony Leadership Days Matter (fork) FloraTab Mercenaries For Me What the hack?! Desynchronized: Tales and News RPG Style Level Up Mod [O21] WikiRim
Requires Vanilla Textures Expanded, which can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2016436324
All credit goes to Oskar Potocki, Helixien, and Erin.
Additional Credit to Cody Spring for the original mod which I(Superfly Johnson) updated to 1.2.
Will take down the mod on request by the original author.
